channel.title: Writing to a offsite database
channel.description:
So I'm trying to get character saving to a database made through my webhost, the problem is I can't get the connection to go through.
What I have is:
[code=java] con = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://domain/database_name","user","password"); [/code]
My host is x10, and yes I have added my IP to the list of remote connections allowed.
